answers.answer: There is a possibility that you may have diabetes go to your regular doctor for a full exam.  I'm not sure about the pulse and shortness of breath so see your Doctor soon.

question: Dear Everybody;I am a track and field champ, i practice 6 days a week,my nutrition is very good and i am 18 years old.recently i started to feel some shivering in my hands(like when drinking water from a cup), in addition to shortness of breath, lack of concentration, high pulse which taks long time to cool, and wounds taking too much time to heal, this have really affected my study and practice both physically and psychologically, as i never had those symptomes before, and at the moment i am not taking any medication with a clean health record(didnt have any diseas or allergies).PLEASE HELP or atleast tell me what type of doctor should i see because i am getting devistated by what is happening with me.Thank You;Ali
title: athlete with fatigue and shortness of breath, please read and help !
